Locale.Value:
Fixes in 2.17.16
- Attempted to reduce and mitigate the iOS issue labeled as "Device Lockdown in a Bad State"
- Messages & WhatsApp: fixed an issue where the video thumbnail was not visible when exporting a conversation to PDF
- WhatsApp: added support for 'Locked' chats
- Photos: fixed issue with deleting photos on iOS 17.0.2 and above
- Implemented other fixes and improvements for stability
